courses.title: Deep Learning
courses.description: An introductory course covering the fundamentals of deep learning, neural networks, and their applications in computer vision and natural language processing.

courses.title: Compter Vision
courses.description: Topics in computer vision including classic methods like hough voting and RANSAC, multiview stereo, and modren methods like vision transformers and generative modeling.

courses.title: 3D Computer Vision Seminar
courses.description: Advanced topics in 3D computer vision including point cloud processing, neural rendering, and 3D scene understanding.
